_header: In England by old days / Were kings seven as gest us shows
_description: King Oswald and the Hermit, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN Engelonde by olde dawesWere kynges vij as Iestes
                    schawes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord crist þider vs wisÞer Ioye wiþ outen
                    ende is. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 289-90.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
IN yngelande be alde dawesWas seuene kinges alsgestis vs
                    schawes…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…And giue vs grace oure life to ledeþat we þat ioye
                    take to oure mede . Amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoetc4.First Lines: [ ]g als gest sayes[ ]gh in north humbland…
BodEngPoetc4.Last Lines:
…And of hym selfe litill to m[ ]And mykyll of god þat has
                    hy[ ]
BodEngPoetc4.Note:
6 small fragments from two folios, all damaged and partly
                    unreadable.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
By olde dawes als I vnderstandeWore seuen kynges in
                    englande…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Nowe god graunte vs þis mekenesAnd bryng vs til his
                    blisse endles
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title: De sancto Oswaldo et quodam heremita (p. 255)

CULDd11.First Lines:
IN Engelond be olde dawiswere kingis vij as gestis
                    schawis…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Oure lord crist thedir vs wisÞer ioye witouten ende is
                    Amen

CULGg531.First Lines:
In Ingelande by ald dawesWere geuen kynges als iestes
                    schawes…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And our lyfe so in meknes ledeÞat we þat ioy haf
                    tyll our mede Amen

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
N Engelond bi olde dawesWere kynges seuene as Ieste
                    schawes…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Vre lord crist þidur vs wisÞer Ioye withouten ende
                    is. Amen
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
In ynglande be alde daiesWas seuen kynges als gestis vs
                    schewes…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
And gyue vs grace our life swa ledeThat we þat ioye take to
                    oure mede. Amen

BLHar2391.First Lines: In Ingland be ald dawsAls gestes vs schawis…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Owr lord vs ȝedir bryngTo Ioy þat es with owtyn endyng
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: [    ]cristi (left margin, partially lost due to damage to leaf, f. 198) with “A tale” written above

BLHar4196.First Lines: In igland in elder dawseWar seuyn kinges als clerkes knaws…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Bot vnto god so to tak hedeþat we in heuyn may haue oure mede
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De vita sancti oswaldi regis (rubric, f. 109rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.57-64.

HunHM129.First Lines:
In ynglande be hale dawesWas kynges vii als gest vs
                    schewes…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…and gyfe vs grace swa oure loyfe to ledeþat we may
                    þare take oure mede
HunHM129.Attributed Title:
Of þe lyfe of sant oswald (added by later hand, right margin, f.
                    119)
